Johannes is an MD-PhD student in the research group of [Professor Briel](../matthias-briel/index.qmd). His main PhD project is the implementation, coordination, and analysis of the LIQPLAT trial. He is interested in clinical trials methodology, efficient trial design, and causal inference. When not immersed in the world of medical research, Johannes can be found pondering the principles of Popperian epistemology and analytic philosophy.
